#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define set(p) memset(p,-1,sizeof(p))
#define clr(p) memset(p,0,sizeof(p))
#define ll long long int
#define llu unsigned long long int
#define si(n)					scanf("%d",&n)
#define sf(n) 					scanf("%lf",&n)
#define ss(n)                                   scanf("%s",n)
#define rep(i,a,n) for(i=(a);i<(n);i++)
#define pii pair<int,int>
#define pb(x) push_back(x)
#define v(x) vector<x>
using namespace std;

int gcd(int a,int b)
{
 int r, i;
  while(b!=0){
    r = a % b;
    a = b;
    b = r;
  }
  return a;
}


long long int power(long long int x,long long int y)
{
    long long int temp,ty,my;
    long long int mod;
    mod=1000000007;
    if( y == 0)
        return 1;
    temp = power(x, y/2);
    ty=(temp%mod)*(temp%mod);
    if (y%2 == 0)
        {

                return ty%mod;
        }
    else
        {
                my=(x%mod)*(ty%mod);
                return my%mod;
        }
}



long long int mini(long long int a,long long int b)
{
        return a<b?a:b;
}



struct abhi
{
       ll val;
       ll pos;
};

struct abhi brr[100010];

bool cmp(struct abhi x,struct abhi y)
{
        return x.pos<y.pos;
}

char ss[100010];

//int b[100000];
vector< pair<int,int> > abhi;



ll a[1000010];
ll b[20];
ll bx[20];
ll c[1000010];

ll solve(ll si_x,ll tx)
{

    ll i,p,z,x,flag,j;
    x=tx;
    z=0;
    for(i=0;(i<si_x || z>0);i++)
                {
                        z=z+a[i]*x;
                        p=z%10;
                        a[i]=p;
                        z=z/10;
                }

    return i;

}

int check(ll si_x,ll si_y)
{
    ll i,j,k,p,r;
    ll d=0;
    i=si_x-1;
    j=si_y-1;
    while(i>=0 && j>=0)
    {
        if(a[i]==b[j])
        {
            i--;
            j--;
            d++;
        }
        else
        {
                break;
        }
    }

                if(d==si_y)
                    return 1;
                else
                    return 0;
}


int main()
{
        ll t,m,i,n,r,x,y,j,k=0,p,kk=0;
        cin>>t;
        while(t--)
        {
            kk++;
            cin>>x>>y;
            ll xx,yy;
            xx=x;
            yy=y;
            memset(a,0,sizeof(a));
            for(i=0;xx>0;i++)
            {
                    r=xx%10;
                    xx=xx/10;
                    a[i]=r;
            }
            ll si_x=i;
            for(i=0;yy>0;i++)
            {
                    r=yy%10;
                    yy=yy/10;
                    b[i]=r;
            }
            ll si_y=i;


            /*cout<<" ---  Y ---\n";
            for(i=si_y-1;i>=0;i--)
            {
                cout<<b[i];
            }
            cout<<"\n";*/


            ll ans=1;
            ll new_si_x=si_x;
            while(1)
            {

                if(check(new_si_x,si_y)==1)
                {
                    break;
                }
                //cout<<"yo 1 \n";
                new_si_x=solve(new_si_x,x);
                //cout<<"yo 2 \n";
                ans++;
            }


            cout<<"Case "<<kk<<": "<<ans<<"\n";
        }

        return 0;
}
